name: Gotta Match 'Em All
description:
Hey you! YES YOU!
How good is your memory? Shall we test?

A quickly made memory game.  All you need is to match all the cards before time runs out.

On level start, you're shown the cards, start the level and start matching them before the time runs out. For each match, you're added extra time, because life ain't easy but this game sure tries to make your life easier for this game.

Difficulty modes:-

  • Pfft, too ez: Levels 1-4
  • kinda ez: Levels 5-8
  • HALP! So many cards: Levels 8-12
